com.rli.util.djava

Class LDAPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rli.util.djava.LDAPClient

  • public class LDAPClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for LDAP related processing from dynamic java script.

      • search

        public javax.naming.NamingEnumeration search(java.lang.String ldapCMD,
                                             java.lang.String ldapUser,
                                             java.lang.String ldapPassword)
        Search into LDAP.
        Parameters:
        ldapCMD - --- ldap command
        ldapUser - --- ldap user
        ldapPassword - --- ldap password
        Returns:
        NamingEnumeration --- search result from LDAP

      • search

        public javax.naming.NamingEnumeration search(java.lang.String ldapServer,
                                             java.lang.String ldapPort,
                                             java.lang.String ldapBasedn,
                                             java.lang.String ldapFilter,
                                             java.lang.String ldapScope,
                                             java.lang.String ldapLimit,
                                             java.lang.String ldapAttributes,
                                             java.lang.String ldapUser,
                                             java.lang.String ldapPassword)
        Search into LDAP.
        Parameters:
        ldapServer - --- ldap server to be searched
        ldapPort - --- ldap port to connect
        ldapBasedn - --- ldap basedn to start the search from
        ldapFilter - --- ldap filter
        ldapScope - --- ldap scope - one, sub or base
        ldapLimit - --- ldap limit - 0 returns all entries
        ldapAttributes - --- ldap attributes to be returned from the result, if null or blank it will return all entries
        ldapUser - --- ldap user
        ldapPassword - --- ldap password
        Returns:
        NamingEnumeration --- search result from LDAP

      • ldapSearch

        public XMLOperation ldapSearch(java.lang.String ldapCMD,
                               java.lang.String ldapUser,
                               java.lang.String ldapPassword)
        Search into LDAP and return the XMLOperation object.
        Parameters:
        ldapCMD - --- ldap command
        ldapUser - --- ldap user
        ldapPassword - --- ldap password
        Returns:
        XMLOperation --- search result from LDAP as an XMLOperation object

      • ldapSearch

        public XMLOperation ldapSearch(java.lang.String ldapServer,
                               java.lang.String ldapPort,
                               java.lang.String ldapBasedn,
                               java.lang.String ldapFilter,
                               java.lang.String ldapScope,
                               java.lang.String ldapLimit,
                               java.lang.String ldapAttributes,
                               java.lang.String ldapUser,
                               java.lang.String ldapPassword)
        Search into LDAP and return the XMLOperation object.
        Parameters:
        ldapServer - --- ldap server to be searched
        ldapPort - --- ldap port to connect
        ldapBasedn - --- ldap basedn to start the search from
        ldapFilter - --- ldap filter
        ldapScope - --- ldap scope - one, sub or base
        ldapLimit - --- ldap limit - 0 returns all entries
        ldapAttributes - --- ldap attributes to be returned from the result, if null or blank it will return all entries
        ldapUser - --- ldap user
        ldapPassword - --- ldap password
        Returns:
        XMLOperation --- search result from LDAP as an XMLOperation object

      • getRealDN

        public java.lang.String getRealDN(java.lang.String virtualDN)
        Function to get the RealDN, represented by the Virtual DN, from underlying LDAP directory.
        Parameters:
        virtualDN - - The Virtual DN for which the Real DN has to be found.
        Returns:
        String the Real DN if it is found else returns null.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
